title: Fake Love
overview: The female CEO took a fancy to the male bartender, and the two had a passionate night. Si Nan offered to support Bai Zi Hao with a high salary to help him with his sister's medical expenses. In fact, her real purpose was to transplant his kidney to her brother, who suffered from uremia. Bai Zi Hao also pretended to be a prey to be approached by a rich woman. The sister who suffered from leukemia was actually his childhood sweetheart, An Ran. After An Ran met Si Nan's rich brother, she didn't want to live a poor life with the bartender anymore. She lied that she had leukemia to make him give up. At the same time, Si Nan and Bai Zi Hao became more emotionally involved as they spent time together and got along. He wanted to stop the loss in time and was ready to run, but found out that An Ran was with Si Nan's brother. All the scams were revealed.
